text: Aap say yeh ehal-e-kitab darkhuast kertay hain kay aap inn kay pass koi aasmani kitab layen hazrat musa (alh-e-salam) say to enhon ney iss say boht bari darkhuast ki thi kay humen khullam khula Allah Taalaa ko dikha dey pus inn kay iss zulm kay baees inn per karakay ki bijli aa pari phir bawajood yeh kay inn kay pass boht daleel phonch chuki thi enhon ney bachray ko apna mabood bana liya lekin hum ney yeh bhi moaf farma diya aur hum ney musa ko khula ghalba (aur sareeh daleel) inayat farmaee
